target.name: main
target.echo: which cygpath 2> /dev/null if [ $? = 1 ]; then BUILD_DIR="/proj/ucare/honglibu/hbase-0.94.12/target" else BUILD_DIR=`cygpath --unix '/proj/ucare/honglibu/hbase-0.94.12/target'` fi if [ `ls $BUILD_DIR/nativelib | wc -l` -ne 0 ]; then cp -PR $BUILD_DIR/nativelib/lib* $BUILD_DIR/hbase-0.94.12/hbase-0.94.12/lib/native/Linux-amd64-64 fi

which cygpath 2> /dev/null if [ $? = 1 ]; then BUILD_DIR="/proj/ucare/honglibu/hbase-0.94.12/target" else BUILD_DIR=`cygpath --unix '/proj/ucare/honglibu/hbase-0.94.12/target'` fi
cd $BUILD_DIR/hbase-0.94.12 tar czf $BUILD_DIR/hbase-0.94.12.tar.gz hbase-0.94.12
